replies.body: A moment of silence for AP Shaco.
How is AP shaco gone??
His Shiv does physical damage now, not magic. He's lost most of his burst.
But it still has AP scaling the type of dmg is just different...
exactly, so building magic pen doesnt increase the damage of shiv anymore. when boxes and ult do magic dmg. ap shaco is dead
I feel your pain. Im waiting right now for the skins to come out.
Has anyone actually leveled up in honor? Cause i haven't at all haahah and im quite the positive person

> Using Xayah’s R - Featherstorm and hitting an enemy champion at the same time a turret kills a minion would cause the turret not to aggro Champions until it's next minion target is dead

How the hell do people find this stuff?

More importantly, why have the same pope still not noticed this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s0Nrz4fekIU
another PORO KING WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO -_-
Lmao
It say that Shaco's "E base damage down" but its gone up. Is that a typo Riot?
ratio got changed from total ad to bonus ad. instead of getting 5+(65 [total ad]) damage at level 1 hes only getting 50+(5 [0.6 bonus ad])
I'm not talking about the bonus ad its the base damage its gone up.
Not a typo. Base attack damage still means base damage.

but it says his "E base damage" not "base attack damage" and if base damage means base attack damage why has does it say E base damage. I'm pretty sure its a typo and also there isn't anything that went down so... I'm so confused.
How long until SKT skins become available?
I want to know that as well
is the SKT T1 skin splash art a Fire Emblem: Awakening reference?
Still no URF, fuck sakes Riot is useless.
when is the next patch
